biotools.summary: TopProperty is a meta-predictor that combines outputs of 27 primary predictors using two ensembles of deep neural networks to predict secondary structure, solvent accessibility, transmembrane topology and membrane exposure for both transmembrane and globular proteins. TopProperty is trained on datasets without bias towards a high number of sequence homologs and the predictions are significantly better than all primary predictors on all quality metrics. TopProperty eliminates the need for protein type- or property-tailored tools, especifically for transmembrane proteins.
